ds_id: Probity Advisors Inc. Has $1.21 Million Stake in Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL)@Defense World@2023-06-15 18:54:34.512486@Apple
data_content: Probity Advisors increased its stake in Apple by 4% in Q4 2017, according to the company's latest SEC Form 13F filing. The firm now has 9,283 shares in the company worth $1.2m. Other investors boosting their positions in Apple in Q4 included Moneta Group Investment Advisors, which acquired 569,066,184 shares in the Apple, and Morgan Stanley, which acquired an additional 25,926,552 shares. Vanguard Group increased its stake in Q1 2017, acquiring 8,734,393 new shares, to bring its total to 1.27 billion.
